Tag_Youmay.description: the memory | the [[Atos the Beast Caller | mercenary]]

Tag_Imageneed.description: ''[[Legacy of the First Blade | Assassin's Creed: Odyssey — Legacy of the First Blade]]''

MemoryInfobox.description: 'The Phila|Tempest assigned a mercenary to patrol the Patrai|city, a major port in Achaia. Foolishly believing himself superior to the Kassandra|Eagle Bearer in every way, he longed for the day that his bear trampled the eagle underfoot.'
MemoryInfobox.appearance: 'Assassin's Creed: Odyssey' – 'Legacy of the First Blade: Shadow Heritage'

General_Description: '''Atos the Beast Caller''' was a virtual representation of one of [[Kassandra]]'s genetic memories, relived by [[Layla Hassan]] through the Portable [[Animus|Animus HR-8.5]].
Section_Description: Kassandra tracked down the [[Atos the Beast Caller|mercenary]] hired to eliminate her.
Section_Dialogue:
Kassandra found the [[mercenary]] in [[Patrai]] and attacked him. She eliminated him and recovered a letter on his body. *'''Mercenary Correspondence:'''
''We'll cover [[Boura]]. [[Aias the Clean|Aias]] will work with the soldiers and their [[Polemarch]].'' *'''Kassandra:''' ''More mercenaries sent by the [[Phila|Tempest]]. Must be some bounty.''
Section_Outcome: Kassandra eliminated Atos the Beast Caller, discovering that more mercenaries had been hired to eliminate her.
Section_References:
*''[[Assassin's Creed: Odyssey]]'' – ''[[Legacy of the First Blade: Shadow Heritage]]''
